ctu_text: ", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The \u201cShramik Parivahan Yojana\u201d is implemented by the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker\u2019s Welfare Board (GBOCWWB), Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat. Under the scheme, the registered construction workers will be provided a bus pass through the Municipal Corporation at a concessional rate for commuting from Kadianaka to the workplace. "}]}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 2, "value": "in-kind", "label": "In Kind"}, "benefits": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Under the scheme, registered construction workers will receive a bus pass at a concessional rate for commuting from Kadianaka to the workplace. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Under the scheme, the beneficiary is required to contribute 20% of the pass amount, while the board covers the remaining 80%.

**Step 03:** Attach all the required documents and submit it to the concerned official in the municipal corporation office. 
**Step 04:** After verification of the details and a bus pass may be issued to the applicant by the authority. 
**Note:** 4 municipalities of the state (Ahmedabad, Vadodara, Surat, and Rajkot) are included in this scheme.
